**Refining Categorization Strategy**

My focus has shifted to the definitive "admin" term within the ticket text. The remaining terms are less indicative of other categories, so I am refining my logic to primarily reflect that finding. I'm confident about this categorization.


**Categorizing with Confidence**

I've zeroed in on the "admin" keyword. It now clearly points toward "Administrative rights," rendering the other terms less relevant in this particular case. I've re-evaluated and discarded the other options. The remaining text is noise or not directly related. I can categorize this with certainty.
